website_summaries.verdict: There's a lot to love about this glamorous hat, and its great sun protection and durable material add to its appealing feature set.
pros: Comes in many colors including black, chocolate, citron, cobalt blue, hot pink, white, and navy
cons: No room in top of hat for ponytail, bun, or other off-the-neck hairstyle

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUSLY STYLISH & shade for 3!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! The brim is really wide so I kept myself, my 8 year old daughter, and 10 month old shielded from the sun! Also, the area of the hat that sits on your head is 8 inches so it was able to fit over my large box braids and stay secured. I received sooooo many compliments and questions on where to purchase this hat! To sum it all up, my best friend said it better...this hat is definitely BOSS status!
customer_reviews.author: Dom Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect "Big Floppy Hat"
customer_reviews.text: Tons of compliments I have a 23 inch head and it fits snug. Definitely ordering the rainbow one too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as it's BIG
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a BIG sun hat that actually works and this one does! It's only that...I am only 4'8 and the hat looks even bigger than it is on taller people. lol. I really like that its brim is thick and stays in shape. It even covers my son when I hold him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hat for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this hat. It is well made and the brim is sturdy. It was shipped in a large box, so as not to fold or crush it. This a goto hat for all of your summer needs and events.
customer_reviews.author: Of Brian Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome big brim, but beware your color choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the multi-brown because I looked at the picture and wanted something darker than the straw color, but I didn’t realize the multi brown has some gold woven in as well as some darker bits (see photo) so I was hoping for an even brown, and from a distance it will be fine. It does seem to be a little small around the crown, but I like that it will sit a little high but still tight. LOVE the wide brim, I’ll probably get this in black at some point as well.
customer_reviews.author: Illuminatrix

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection, easy to style and make into a statement
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to order this as I've had terrible luck buying hats online. I wanted BIG and I got it. Not comically oversized (I'm 5'8") though it might be on a smaller person. It provides great shade and is quite comfortable. I'll add some sort of strap so I don't lose it on a bike ride. Will probably be a little floppy for a boat but that won't stop me. The brim is shapeable but it doesn't *really* stay so be prepared to manage it a little bit. If you want to put something on and totally forget about it, maybe look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fraenkel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Style; Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Upon removing the hat from the outside packaging, I immediately noticed a small area of loose threading which quickly led to the discovery that said area had not been properly nor completely sewn. This hole is the kind that would quickly enlarge. The hat is well-designed and the style is pretty and chic, but the fabrication seems flimsy. Given it was immediately noticeable to me, I don’t know how quality control overlooked it? Despite very much liking the style, I think I’ll start looking again for a similar hat. I finalized my order after reading generally positive reviews so, hopefully, this is a one-off in terms of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. LC

customer_reviews.title: Large but fun
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected. My previous hat was 6" and this was just over 7" so I figured it wouldn't be that much of a difference. It is, and I love it. The head part was bigger but it has an adjustment strap. I'm still adjusting to what I call my "ufo" hat but I love it. Stylish, great for the sun. I'm always out doing yard work or working on my pool and it keeps me from getting burned on face, ears, neck.
customer_reviews.author: Bada Binx

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish Hat
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Super stylish! Can’t wait to take on vacation! The only reason I rated it 4 stars was because it has a few feathers stuck in the sewing on the brim and I’m unable to remove them. However, it still doesn’t take away from the hat!!Also hat is not as tan as appeared in the pic. I assumed it was a more tanned color however when you look up close, it looks more beige and brown. Hope this Helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have lots of hair!
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying I love everything about this hat EXCEPT how small the opening is! I have a lot of thick hair and this hat is so tight on my head I can’t wear it more than 30 min or so without it hurting. I’ve tried stretching it, soaking it, everything I have read online. No luck. I wish they would make this hat in sizes sm/med and large/xl. This hat would be great if it was sized.
customer_reviews.author: VaccinalEel

customer_reviews.title: I have a small head. I read in other ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head. I read in other reviews that the hat would likely not fit and have extra room. I was okay with that knowing I could just stuff the inner band to account for the gaping. However, hen the hat arrived, it didn't have adequate packing. I am accustomed to a firm plastic hat mold accompanying the hat to ensure the hat maintains its shape. My hat has a lot of lumps up top instead a smooth rounded top. Nevertheless, it will serve its purpose. I am not thrilled by the misshaping of the hat but I need it to block the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This hat is... almost comically large. It feels hefty on your head, and the band is larger than my head. These are personal problems, sure, but I guess I just wasn't prepared for how insanely large this hat was. Be prepared; it is gigantic. Then again, that's why I chose to purchase this hat, but I guess I didn't really realize what I was getting myself into
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great product
customer_reviews.text: I received my hat quick. It is just what I expected. The color is dark and rich. The hat is high quality. The fit is very nice. I bought this as a gift and I am very happy with it. The brim is very very wide. But that is what he wanted. I feel the price is about right. I would not want any less quality to save a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Msnobleman

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, looks amazing in pictures
customer_reviews.text: The hat fits a little big in the head area for me but was not unbearable to wear, I just pushed it back a little to see. the quality was good, did not arrive damaged or folded. the shipping box was big enough to arrive completely flat, i'll probably keep it to store the hat there. it is pliable enough to mold to the hat if you'd like to fold the corners and bounces back to original form. gave great shade coverage down to my shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cruise hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is THE definition of a true Kentucky Derby Hat! It's got the largest (and most manageable) brim on any hat I have owned. Great for poolside, cruising, gardening... and you can dress it up with a simple scarf or fabric tied around the brim! This hat is sturdy, well made, and worth EVERY PENNY! It bounced back from being boxed up almost INSTANTLY! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must for the beach or pool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Biggest sun hat I have ever seen, but I love it. Great for those truly sunny places, especially if you burn easily or are very concerned about keeping your skin away from the sun. It's great for the pool or the beach, and is well made. It always bounces back even though you often have to bend it or roll it up to try to take it anywhere with you. It's a nice timeless look and people always tell me they love it and they want one. This is the sunhat of all sunhats. Very glad I bought it, will likely keep it for years and years to come. Amazon ships it in a huge box!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a large sunhat that fully shades your shouders? This is it! I love this hat! Could use some color, but for a plain sun hat it is exactly what I wanted. Fits great, wore it out kayaking and it stayed firm even in a strong breeze. Good shade, very comfortable. I love this hat!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: BIG BRIM and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Just know what you're purchasing! This is a beautiful hat, well-made (as always, thank you San Diego Hat Company!) and is exactly as the picture shows--nice natural color! I would just note, know that you are purchase an extremely wide-brimmed hat--the brim is around 9.5" all the way around. If that's what you want--that's what you get! The hat is also one of those, fold up and springs back to size without damage, which is perfect because it is quite large (traveling and storage) and who doesn't love that convience?
customer_reviews.author: KKaszpurenko

customer_reviews.title: Dramatic hat with great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a dramatic, wide-brimmed hat that gives you tremendous sun-coverage and style. Prepare to get tons of compliments with this hat. The one obvious caveat is that it can't fit into a carryon without being folded so when not wearing on your head, you'll have to hand-carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Rintimtim

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold shape
customer_reviews.text: This extra large hat came folded in a small mailing package. It arrived bent, creased, and unwearable. I will be returning if I can not find a way to reshape and have it hold as the description states.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this hat except for one thing - it is too heavy. I have been wearing it around the house for a few days, on and off, to see if I would get used to the weight of it but I have decided to return it. Every time without fail, about 3-4 minutes after putting it on I developed a neck ache which would not go away after hat was removed and developed into a headache. I am not normally prone to headaches. I wish it was lighter weight because it is everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Entrance worthy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. And dramatic. Not for the meek. This hat will bring you lots of attention. I ordered this for My yatch birthday party amd it didnt let me down. Some of my friends even took pictures in it . I wanted a much bigger one but I ended up Buying this and love it
customer_reviews.author: Ruthiana

customer_reviews.title: Great Brim, Unfortunately NOT for Small or Medium Heads
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this hat, it's exactly what I was looking for in terms of the brim, but the hat part itself is very large. I measured the circumference at almost 23 1/2 inches, which corresponds to a L or XL hat size. I wear a Medium at exactly 22 inches and this did not fit me at all. Don't count on the adjustable sizing tie, it is purely decorative and cannot reduce the circumference of the hat at all.
customer_reviews.author: x03

customer_reviews.title: Huge brim is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Im petite 5 ft 4 this hat covers my shoulders and then some.. thats why i bought it.. love it! Note that the multi brown includes has metallic gold strands in the weave. I did not notice this in the photo. I love it and im keeping it tho i already have a metallic sun hat and would have chose a different one just for variety sake.
customer_reviews.author: DaylightMoon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely flimsy! My friend bought the exact same hat in San Diego, but black. Her hat was not flimsy or bendy. Held its shape beautifully for our trip to Hawaii. My hat still has the tags on it. It went on vacation to Hawaii with us but never left our condo to see the beach!
customer_reviews.author: G.Rivera

customer_reviews.title: BRIM CANNOT BE SHAPED!  JUST FLOPS!
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat otherwise, nice big brim, like the material and fit, but I bought it BECAUSE the video showed it could be shaped. This is a big Lie! The video is deliberately deceptive! For that reason alone they deserve 0 stars. I can still use it out in the garden. Maybe I can install a wire of some sort around the brim. BEWARE!! You cannot shape it! I took a magnet all around the brim. No wire of any kind. It is basically a semi-floppy hat.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great price
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful in person and it came with a plastic thing to maintain the shape of the hat. I love the size and I saw a similar one on social media the double of the value. This one is cheaper and looks the same.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Want the huge hat look without the huge price tag?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sun hat that was on trend with the huge straw hats I’d seen on fashion websites this summer. Those hats are super large but, also super expensive. This hat is a great substitute and it’s very affordable while still offering maximum shade coverage. It came in a huge box, therefore, in excellent condition. Update: the first time I wore it kayaking a gust of wind blew it down the lake. By the time a kayaked to it, it sunk like a stone. :( in deep water. Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: It’s bigger than I originally thought but cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little heavier than I would like but considering it is oversized...I was able to tighten the string bow outside to fit my small head but still cute and will do the trick to protect me from too much sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Jacie

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, quality hat.
customer_reviews.text: This hat was not my first choice, but I purchased it because it was the only one that would be delivered in time for me to wear it to an upcoming wedding. I was very happy with the delivery time, and even more pleased with the look and quality of this hat. This is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Grandama Opie

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the color is off-gold (?!) not multi brown
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Multi Brown color. It came and it is gold, literally gold shiny string woven into the hat. It cheapened it for me, I was hoping for a matte medium tan like the photo. Not worth $50. Also incredibly narrow, I don’t know how you would wear this without a headache. So disappointed I really wanted this to be a smash hit.
customer_reviews.author: k1313

customer_reviews.title: Best hat ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for a wedding trip to New Orleans. The Bride wanted to do a coven photo shoot while we were down there. So I purchased this and we never did the photo shoot. But I still wore it and got the nick name "The Hat" from a band we went to see. It was and is an amazing piece. It makes me feel a little like one of the Aunts from Practical Magic. I can't wait for the summer so I can wear it some more!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: this is a very very big hat
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this, not because I didn't like it, but because I couldn't use it in my day to day life. Its too big to fit in my backpack! ANy way if you are really looking for a big hat, to keep yourself in constant chic shade this is it. I've know umbrellas with less coverage.

customer_reviews.title: FOR SHAME!
customer_reviews.text: They folded this thing up in very tight plastic, so that when I unwrapped it, the brim did not stay out. It was like being in blinders and very frustrating. There was PLENTY of room in the shipping box so that they did not have to fold it into an 8" square. FOR SHAME! The color is more green than yellow and not a great color. For the price, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Torchsingz

customer_reviews.title: The best hat!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sun hat I've purchased on here. It's not cheap and worth the price. I love it and it covers you up all the way to your shoulders if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Goly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hat
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly beautiful hat. I read the reviews and some were iffy but let me tell you everything that was described in the intro video was spot on about the hat. I will be wearing it saturday and will leave a pic. It is big and will turn heads thats how much of a statement it is. I got the citron color so its bright and sunshiny. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice wide brim, comes crushed in a small box
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality sun hat with a very nice extra wide brim to keep the sun out. Sadly, it's shipped in a rather small box, folded to accommodate. Once out of the box, smoothing the rim (which has a malleable wire) takes some time and even then, the woven fabric of the hat retains wrinkles. I expect I will be able to cover the areas with a cotton cloth/handkerchief and carefully iron out the wrinkles with a low heat iron. Since the hat is not made of a natural straw or raffia, it may melt at high temperatures. So beware if you attempt this. If I can make it smooth, it will be an elegant, very useful hat.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now! This hat turns heads.
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat and got tons of compliments. I was gorgeous and I cannot wait to find places to wear it again. Kept me from getting sunburn in 100 degree heat and look like a hot sexy woman in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hat!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shade created by this hat - it fully protects my face, neck, bust, shoulders, and upper back so that I can sun just my stomach and legs. Although I bought it in a dark color, my head doesn't get hot at all. It was perfectly packed and has held a nice shape all summer. The crown measurement is a little large for my head though, it slides down or moves around unpleasantly in a breeze. I always get compliments when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: LaniO

customer_reviews.title: Not for wind!! But otherwise awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this hat on in Whole Foods, then checked online to see if it was available in a different color for my upcoming trip to Aruba. For reference my head is 22" in diameter and it fits well. I love the look of the hat, but it wound up kinda being a pain to constantly hold onto it, because it is sooooo windy in Aruba. At one point it blew off my head and into the ocean, and my wonderful boyfriend jumped in to retrieve it. It also packs very well in a carry on bag, just make sure to stuff socks or clothes in the "head part" so it doesn't get crushed.
customer_reviews.author: @d7852a

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Sun
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hat! Yea, people look at you at first but eventually they stop. I had brain surgery and was spending two weeks in the Caribbean and wanted to make sure that my head and neck were covered where the incisions were and this hat did that without a problem. It also protected my shoulders and upper back. It fit great and also travels well in a suitcase. It takes it's shape right back when you unpack it.
customer_reviews.author: Bahamamama

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Summer Vacation but I still Need to Stay Out of the Sun HAT
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved wearing this floppy and overly dramatic hat on our first Hawaii trip. She said it was fun to wear to the beach, poolside or to lunch. Just expect lots of flops and flips, it's an activity as well as a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keeps the sun off my wife's face and shoulder - cute and functional. fits medium sized head
customer_reviews.text: We found this hat originally at a discount retailer for $10. While on vacation in the tropics, it got left behind and we were very sad as she loved it. Not only is it super cute, but also functional - keeps the sun off my wife's shoulders and face. It took us 3 years to find a replacement and we found the exact one here. Super happy to have found it. My wife has a medium size head and it fits perfectly (I say medium because she owns 4 medium sized motorcycle helmets of various brands) - but should also mention that she has thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews measured my head and expected it to be too big. Its perfect. I love it! It large enough to get attention but not too large as to look ridiculous. I love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Dorius

customer_reviews.title: Can cover even my shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know it has lurex inside. Sparkling is a bad thing at all but something I didn’t expect. The color is little more lighter/yellowish than I expected(tan), but still a great color for the outings.
customer_reviews.author: shur

customer_reviews.title: item is great, packaging and shipping are terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The hat is gorgeous, if only... it didn't come ruined from the packaging! I have ordered this hat THREE times and each time it has come shoved into a too small plastic bag and shoved into a plastic shipping bag. Do you know what happens to a hat, even a packable one, that gets lots of other packages stacked on it? I took 3 photos to show how badly these hats were compromised by the packaging and shipping. So, buy this hat, just not from AMAZON! (Although, to be fair, my customer service reps were all wonderful in trying to get a properly packaged one out to me...it wasn't their fault...)
customer_reviews.author: TjB

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in hat form
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS HAT!!!!! Years ago, I saw a woman wearing an oversized floppy hat and I knew that someday I would have one too... now I do! I love it, it shades my super pale skin, keeps me cool and I feel like a rock star wearing it. Can't ask for much more from a hat!
customer_reviews.author: Rain March

customer_reviews.title: Love it...but very floppy
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect my only complaint is that it doesn’t hold shape very well. Very floppy. But I love how big the brim is very sexy in the beach. Can’t wait to take it on vacay
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Banks

customer_reviews.title: Need A Big, Floppy Hat?
customer_reviews.text: This is it! Perfectly wonderful. The crown isn't too tight either, I have a lot of hair! This will protect my face 100% I bought 2 colors as I have to wear one all the time I'm outside..
customer_reviews.author: P. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: So huge, it's kind of impractical.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made hat. High quality materials, lovely design. It is so huge that it's almost ridiculous. Perhaps if you are over six feet in height, it will look fabulous. But at five and change, I feel a bit silly wearing it. It also becomes floppy rather quickly, especially on a humid day. You can't really fit through a regular doorway wearing it. It does not have a chin strap, so will not stay on in more than a gentle breeze. It will cover you and a baby if you are babywearing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Fits a large head
customer_reviews.text: Fit my giant head! I had to send the cheaper one back (too small) but this version worked and it’s HUGE!! Will use again I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: The perfect big, dramatic beach/summer hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat rocked on my recent beach trip and because of it I'm the least sunburnt of my whole group (and being the palest of the group, that's quite the feat). I rolled it with the brim rolling up towards the crown to fit in my suitcase and it popped back into shape quite well after the 5 hour plane ride. I wouldn't reccommend rolling it under towards the underside of the hat as this makes the brim bend oddly when you wear it. It came rolled under like that in the package but I was able to flatten it with a few heavy books and it was fine!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great hat! Protects from the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat! I’m 5’2 and it covers my head and shoulders. I’m able to hang out in 100 degree weather on the river longer b/c of this hat. Keeps me cool and I get lots of compliments while wearing it. Only con is if it’s windy, comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for this hat for years now and finally got what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This hat is perfect, I have a small head so the hat fits me just fine I don't see how people are saying it doesn't. It's heavy, the brim has weight to it which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kkasket

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous hat if you like a little shine
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful hat with lovely form, just not the color I expected. I ordered the multi-brown and it had gold tone / metallic fibers when I wanted something a little more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Came in a big box shipped flat which was great as it came in perfect condition. It is perfect to keep the sun off! I've worn it to the beach plenty, love it! It just doesn't do well on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Luv this hat
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the beach as much as I am... You can not go wrong with this hat. The best big beach hat ever.
customer_reviews.author: PLF

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an oversized sun hat and this for the bill to a tee! Wide enough to cover my shoulders and shapeable. A real statement maker!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hat
customer_reviews.text: You need to buy this hat!!!! it's great material, good price, stylish, and the most important part is that it protects you from the sun! I got so many compliments on my vacation trip but living in a state like California, you definitely need one of these for the beach. It is worth the money, I recommend 100 %
customer_reviews.author: Bessy Rivera

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! It covers my shoulders, face and back. My daughter-in-law saw me wear it and wanted one too!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This hat is huge but beautiful and well made. I have a big head and lots of hair but it fits good. It’s a little heavy But I think it’s worth it. I can’t wait till summertime so I can get some good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisy

customer_reviews.title: Large floppy hat that can be shaped!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, high quality, can be shaped & very large brim! The white is not bright gleaming white, but still nice.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to wear this hat!!! It’s a perfect picture hat and, although somewhat floppy, you CAN shape it to turn up or down depending on what look you want. My head is large and doesn’t fit many hats, and this has plenty of room. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Fits my head perfectly. Really great find. Will take on vacation with me to be fashionable and ward off the sun. Really worth the cost. Just wish i knew how i was gonna pack it in my suitcase. Thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Freedgrl33

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Attention-Grabbing, and UV Protectant
customer_reviews.text: This hat covers my whole face, my chest, and my arms, and I always get some sort of comment about it. I think my favorite part of this hat is guessing what someone will say about it. The material has also held up remarkably well, even when I packed it in a suitcase. The brim is weighted a bit, but even a breezy day will have you hanging on to the sides. It adds a bit of elegance whether you're sunning on the beach or strolling through the park.
customer_reviews.author: Julie O

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, other hats I have like this are so flimsy, not this one, Perfect
customer_reviews.author: TennisKatt

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a parasol, when you can wear one?
customer_reviews.text: This is a big hat. A very big hat. It's only missing a stuffed bird and topiary, and it's a Derby hat. It provides considerable shade, not only for the wearer, but for a cast of small children that may surround the wearer, seeking a respite from the summer sun. It's well made, tightly woven, folds down smaller than you'd think something this size could fold, and travels well. Another fine example of American workmanship from the fabu folks at San Diego Hats.
customer_reviews.author: SoapyHollow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat the fit was perfect. I need to purchase it in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Adnie Gaudin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous hat -- but it's a bit tight
customer_reviews.text: This hat is fabulous. Truly. I love wearing it and gazing at myself in the mirror, tugging at the brim to try different shapes. And that's why it breaks my heart to say it's too snug on my head. I may even have to return it because wearing it for more than about 5 minutes at a time gives me a headache. If you have a big head, and/or thick hair do yourself a favor and get a different hat so you don't have to go through the heart-wrenching process of returning such a fab hat.
customer_reviews.author: pdxmel

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat.
customer_reviews.text: This hat is wonderful. It is well made and pliable. It holds its shape beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Young

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it, that is all that matters. Happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Richard K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: It gas beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful but a little bit bigger than expected. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ana L.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and glamorous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my MIL, she had admired mine and we both try to keep the sun off of our faces. It’s also kind of fun and glamorous to wear such a broad brimmed hat. A chin strap would spoil the effect, so I need to look into hat pins as I live near the beach where it’s usualky breezy.
customer_reviews.author: MindyC

customer_reviews.title: Love this huge statement hat!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and fashionable, can't wait to wear on vacation. Very pack-able.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: super fun hat
customer_reviews.text: Yes this hat is huge and awesome. I bought it to wear on a trip to St. John and had the widest brim on the island. I bought tropical flower print scarf and tied it around it too and it looked great. I spent a day walking around some shops and the sales women in nearly every shop all gushed over it and wanted to take a closer look or know where I got it. I think the biggest draw was the way the brim stays in place when you position it. It was also really great shade from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This hat is huuuge and perfect. I purchased it for a Marceline from Adventure Time cosplay but end up wearing it on the summer or a part of a pin up ensemble. It is sort of spendy but is well made and thick and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the extra wide brim! Haven’t worn it out yet, but it’s beautiful on. Can’t wait to wear on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: great shade; glamorous, too
customer_reviews.text: For those of you searching for a sturdy sun hat that covers you up well, this is it. I received so many compliments while wearing it to the pool. And because it IS glamorous, you must wear it with confidence! The eyes will definitely be upon you. The wonderful color is perfect for every outfit, boating, cruising, at the pool or beach. Even a daytime wedding. Enjoy with a smile!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary R

customer_reviews.title: For anyone who wants to be EXTRA!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love a bit of glam in my life . Love this Oversized large black sun hat . It definitely gives you a glamorous EXTRA look . Perfect for keeping the sun off you .
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Massive Brim--Be sure to measure
customer_reviews.text: This hat has a huge brim, far larger than the prior one. I can't wear it--it flops in my face. Beautiful hat though.
customer_reviews.author: anahata

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hat for everything from beach sun protection to a Kentucky Derby Hat!! I can easily add tule and flowers with safety pins and take it right back off without damaging the hat! I can crumple it, pack it in a suite case and it always goes back to it's shape. It is very breathable and doesn't make me hot but does provide plenty of sun protection and shade! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cavitt

customer_reviews.title: Well, I wanted a large brimmed hat.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I wanted a large brimmed hat...... I can shade the entire family with this baby. Sooo big, it's impractical. A slight breeze, & you're airborne!!! Please add a large ribbon/tie to each side, then you've got a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: m lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The brim was a LOT bigger than I expected and I was leaving for vacation too soon to purchase another so I just rocked it. It's definitely a diva hat but I got a lot of comments. And I ended up loving it, diva-sized brim and all. I even abused it during packing in my suitcase and it pops right back into shape no problems. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hat just delivered a day too late
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cobalt blue oversized sun hat. However it was not delivered on time as stated, due to the carrier. I needed the hat for a fashion event And the hat came a day after the event. There wasn’t a need for me to keep it so I returned it as soon as it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, GIANT brim, very dramatic, I love it. Did I say fantastic quality?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME HAT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for my upcoming Caribbean wedding and honeymoon. I wanted a large stylish hat to shield my face because I have a very fair complexion and this one fits the bill. It's not overly heavy and the brim can be bent to shape it as you like-- the quality is excellent. It shields my entire face and most of my shoulders/chest. My only concern is whether or not this baby can be packed flat (read: squished) and still come out of the suitcase looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Super large hat, good sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: This hat has saved me from many sunburns. Rather huge, as its almost an umbrella in itself, does fold as it is heavy. So i do have to hold it up to look up. But great thing for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, durable and great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this hat. I NEVER go on the beach without it. It's huge! Fantastic coverage from the sun. Great quality. It gets crushed and I can form it right back. And I think it's quite stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina McVeigh

customer_reviews.title: This never happens with San Diego hats -sad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat in June and wore it the first time today and the threads are coming loose. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Glendar Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This is the hat in the Lilly Pulitzer summer 2016 photos!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! With help from Lilly Pulitzer lovers online, this is the hat that is featured in the Lilly Pulitzer 2016 summer catalogs and online! Though, it is kind of large for my head.... But there are ways to help it fit snug (google it!). The rim is super large, some may say too large for my 5' 31/2" height! There is a slightly smaller rim one (but it's tan isn't as nice) by Nine West!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great buy please don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Every time I wear it I get compliments from everyone. Stunning make me feel Grand. I'm going to order of the colors thank you excellent price and great presentation
customer_reviews.author: del b.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head and this hat needed to be pulled on tight or rested on the top of my head. However, the brim size is glorious! And, for the price this is a fabulous hat. I've worn it swimming in the pool and it held up to getting wet (no fading or breaking down). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: V. Ennui

customer_reviews.title: Color is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This color is not a natural brown more like a goldfish color. Not what I expected. But the quality of the hat is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon drops the ball on packaging and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Stuffed into a bag and bent and wonky and stuck that way. In addition to this, the hat was slightly too small, I could have dealt with that, but the disheveled look isnt one I am going for.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hot pink, love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the large brim. I use it in the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful I purchased both pink & white for vacation. I wish they had more vibrant colors
customer_reviews.author: Larhonda

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that it does not fit my head perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made hat. I needed a wide brim hat for the most coverage and this does the trick! Just know what you're buying. My daughters have played with it several times and jumped on it occasionally and the hat came out unscathed. The only thing I don't like is that it does not fit my head perfectly; it's slightly bigger and I always thought I have an average size head.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Packs well
customer_reviews.text: This hat is exactly what I was looking for and exactly what I thought I was going to get. It's huge, it stays on my head in all but strong wind, and it packs really well. I rolled it up and stuffed it in my beach bag a few times, and I packed it in a soft-sided suitcase for a flight. It still looks like new. It's malleable enough to shape into whatever shape you want (straight brim, covering one eye, flat on the sides, etc.), and it will stay there without being stiff. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: Best hat I have owned! I'm a vampire when it comes to sun exposing and this hat was all I could ask for. It covered all the way to my shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for Kentucky Derby
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for Kentucky Derby. I decorated it with flowers and because of the large brim, had a stunning, showstopper for a hat!
customer_reviews.author: Carla D. Garber

product_meta.title: San Diego Hat Company Women's Ultrabraid X Large Brim Hat
product_meta.description: Women's ultra braid extra large floppy brim sun hat with SPF sun protection
